description: After a quick dinner? Try this easy, cheesy gnocchi bake that uses Italian-style sausages and gnocchi cooked in a rich tomato sauce, and topped with oozy mozzarella.
keywords: Gnocchi,Sausage,Roast,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Traybake,Weeknight dinner,Low sugar,Sesame free,Budget,May 2021,High protein,High fibre,Pork,Quick & easy lunch,Autumn,Spinach,Peanut free
name: Cheesy Sausage & Gnocchi Traybake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g Italian style pork & fennel sausages, casings removed and discarded, roughly chopped
1 red onion, cut into thin wedges
400g can Woolworths noadded salt diced tomatoes

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fanforced. Heat oil in a large flameproof roasting pan over medium-high heat. Add sausage and gnocchi and cook for 4 minutes or until browned. Add garlic, herbs and onion, then cook, stirring, for 1 minute or until fragrant. Stir in tomatoes and cook for a further 1 minute. Transfer to oven and bake for 8 minutes or until bubbling around edges. Remove pan from oven.
Add mozzarella and gently stir to combine. Bake for 10 minutes or until sausage is cooked through and mozzarella has melted. Serve topped with spinach and seasoned with pepper.
